channel.title: David Clausen
channel.description: Aspiring Web Developer and Ex-Chef, Currently Looking for Full-Stack Opportunities.

item.title: Pomodoro Technique
item.description:
Pomodoro Technique

Pomodoro Technique Website

I recently did a project that required you to create a Pomodoro timer. I am a big fan of their technique. Following it, even loosely, has greatly improved my ability to focus, study and in general knock out projects.

Here is the link currently to my timer Promodoro Timer

Comment below and let me know what you think. Hopefully you find it as useful as I do.
